reviewText: This so-called unrated version should be rated PG. I have the version taped from cinemax, and it is much better. I bought this DVD thinking it was that version. Boy, was I wrong. If you want hot & steamy, don't buy this one. It's not even luke warm.
I have seen both the rated and unrated versions of this movie.  All I can say is the rated version is a rip off. All the steamy scenes are cut short.
This was the really short version. The long version is so much better. The online version is longer, but not the long version either.

One of the best, if not, preciselly the best softcore thriller of all times, . and thats including all  those gems of the B- movies genre, like Animal Instincts. killer looks  etc . etc...  Rochelle Simply lookks like the Hot Wife, every guy dreams about...

secret games 3 is one of the greatest softcore film of all time. It has sex and a good plot. All the women in the film (Rochelle
Swanson, May Karasun (hollie hummel) and Brenda Swanson), were sexy. Most of the sex scenes feature Rochelle and only one with May.
Brenda should have had one. I think it could have a lesbian scene between Rochelle and May. It was obvious that Woody Brown was the villian
because he wore all black throughout the movie.
Item was listed differently (uncut) from the actual movie itself when seeing it.

I should've read the reviews here before I purchased my copy. This is indeed a Rated R version or a cheat version. I thought the running time was for the unrated version since it was what was listed on the movie's info, but the running time for this version is actually 17 minutes shorter. Like 80% of the stuff we buy these movies for is edited out. Why you would create a version like that I'll never know. I threw my copy away.

Item arrived exactly as stated. Possibly a day early. Product was very good shape or better
Everything was noted clearly {nice touch on invoice} Film is good quality. Goodscripting clear sharp
although B movie its gets ++ for keeping story line and suspence keeps you guessing. Actors are good also.
